reviewText: A lovely film for the children and me .
This is a good movie with a nice plot.  I purchased this movie just because I'm a super fan of Charlie Daniels and he is in it.  I enjoyed it

Real good story and James Earl Jones' interpretation
is fabulous. After all, this is the story of something
very unusual for an 11 years old boy.
Everyone should like it .

This is filmed in my old home town,McDade Texas. I'm in it!
I can watch this and see many of my old neighbors who have gone on to their reward.
So,for that reason,I love it..  I also enjoy the story.
